reviews.review: I like things when there can be some exploration of what is happening...sometimes this movie jumped too fast, other times it seemed to give enough and others, too much.  Guess I just can't be satisfied with something that left me feeling empty.
One of the greatest movies ever

This was, perhaps, the worst movie ever made. I wished that Thanos would kill me but he chose to literally kill the rest of the entire cast instead. I'd rather watch the entire Twilight series twice while sleep deprived and only offered rotten tripe from a trash can to eat instead of watching this movie once. I'm quite sure I just lost a decade from my overall lifespan and I wish I lost more because I've become clinically depressed over this and I don't think I have any reason to live anymore.

A perfect movie!
Antony and Joe keep the movie interesting and full of action all along without any mistakes.
One of the best super hero movies. They set the stage for a great epic here, leaving a perfect cliff hanger for the sequel.

Avengers: Infinity War is the stunning culmination of 10 years of exceptional superhero flicks, at times thrilling, hilarious and heartbreakingâ€”absolutely perfect...can't wait for the sequel next summer.

This film executes a beautiful dance between all of the characters involved. Following the events of Civil War in the MCU, Thanos strikes and the Avengers must fight to prevent him from obtaining the infinity stones.

Unbelievable! Nothing before has ever juggled so many characters and  story elements let alone done so with such incredible success. 

No one should watch this if they aren't familiar with the main outline of the MCU up to this point. You'll only appreciate just how amazing this is if you've seen just about all of them. Almost every film contributes to the drama that pays off here in some way.

Unlike many I've never been sold on Thanos's malthusian motivation but he's still a fantastic and truly imposing antagonist.

Pretty much everything else in this film is a triumph. Extraordinary. Must see.

Wow. What can I say about this movie to be able to fit it in a paragraph. This movie was extremely exciting and extremely awesome. The action is top notch for the MCU and some of the best ever. Thanos is the villain we have all been waiting for and just what we need. This movie's cast all perform excellently. The comedy is good. The third act is far and away the best in the MCU. The ending is shocking and still gives me many goosebumps to this day. This movie is extremely great. I cannot stress that enough. The cast, the score, the CGI, the mocap, Thanos, the action, the plot, and the cliffhanger. I'm not going to delve too far into this movie, but there is so much I can say. The only downside is that there are quite a few points in the movie that happen and don't make sense, and quite a few that are an extreme coincidence. The ending was the best thing I have seen to date. So much good about this movie, and easily one of the best movies I have ever seen. 
9.8/10
